directions: In a bowl mix together, yogurt, goat cheese, vinegar, parsley, salt and cracked pepper. Let stand 15 minutes.
In a large bowl combine remaining ingredients. Toss dressing with greens and toss gently to coat. Divide salad evenly among 6 plates (2 cups per).
ingredients: 1 cup Dannon Oikos Plain Greek Nonfat Yogurt
title: Harvest Salad from Oikos®
